name: Weed Runner
description:
Welcome to the big city. When the bills can't be paid, how far will you go to make ends meet? Weed Runner is a drug dealing, crime fueled, story driven, point and click adventure. Weed Running isn't just a side hustle, it's a completely new career path for Mark, who discovers just how lucrative it can be. But, is the payout worth the hustle?

Weed Runner is a point and click adventure at its core. Meet new characters, learn their stories. Discover a slice of life in the big city, from the dark alleyways to the seedy nightclub where the underground weed running begins and ends. Deliver drugs and knock one back in the bar. Navigate conflicts with rivals and in-house fighting. Being a Weed Runner can be a messy job, and sometimes deadly. But in a pursuit of happiness, was it worth it?

Features

  • Weed Runner is story driven with an eccentric cast, including your best friend who never seems to leave the bar, or the loader at the docking bay who probably shouldn't be doing drugs, but we're not asking questions, and even the Kingpin himself.
  • Deliver drugs across the city and explore every dark corner under the guise of a delivery man.
  • Highly detailed pixel art, that adds an immense amount of atmosphere to the city in crisp 1080p.
